sense.def:
Hearing
je čut, ki nam omogoča, da se zavedamo zvokov.

seg.quote: Her limbs were weak, her hearing almost gone.

sense.def:
A hearing
je uradni sestanek, namenjen zbiranju dejstev o nekem dogodku ali problemu.

To be in someone's hearing
ali
to be within someone's hearing
pomeni biti tako blizu, da nekdo lahko sliši, kaj govorimo.

seg.quote: She began to grumble about it within his hearing.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo
gives someone a hearing
ali
gives someone a fair hearing
, posluša tisto osebo, ko pripoveduje svoje mnenje o nečem.
